Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
Lucy
<language> A {distributed} {constraint programming} language, which is an {actor} subset of {Janus}.
["Actors as a Special Case of Concurrent Constraint Programming", K. Kahn <kahn@parc.xerox.com> et al, SIGPLAN Notices 25(10):57-66 (OOPSLA/ ECOOP '90), Oct 1990].
(2001-03-04)
Lucy n : incomplete skeleton of female found in eastern Ethiopia in 1974
